column4: I am having trouble browsing Network.. my network is working fine and I can access my ubuntu machine from all my other machines, but when I try to browse the network from ubuntu it acts like it is trying to load, but nothing ever happens...
But then you only get the "size" of one monitor. Not a spanned desktop, right?
Ok... What if I add a "BIG" picture in the login theme... Would that go on both monitors?
